rows.label: tlk42300081_03_msg0001
rows.name:
I want you to see the commercial
spirit of the Nopon, mo!

rows.label: tlk42300081_03_msg0002
rows.name:
Yajiji's board game shop, Hobby
Trappers, is just up ahead, mo!

rows.label: tlk42300081_03_msg0003
rows.name:
At times like these, play is
important, mo! Board games
can soothe the soul, mo!

rows.label: tlk42300081_03_msg0004
rows.name:
But some people get too heated
and start fighting... mo.
Luxurians are too serious, mo.
